name: Koki
description:
Best game to spend your time with !!

Entertain yourself while popping the locks !!

As you download music and listen music, this game will accompany you !!

Share your best lock level and compete with your best friends...

Easy to play but you must be careful !!

Tap at the right time, pop the lock!

Focusing, timing, attention, reflex and skill... All of these are important in this game.

Pop the lock at the right time!

How far can you go?
